decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Proposed plans and elevations received on 30 June 2014 and location plan received on 22 August 2013 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The outbuilding subject to this application shall only be used by Hotel Management as a games room with shower and WC and shall not be occupied as separate residential accommodation or additional hotel accommodation.
description: Use of single storey detached outbuilding at rear of property by Hotel Management as a store and staff room with shower and WC
